1.content: You were watching Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi one night & suddenly a big flash came out of no where & knocked you cold.You wake up & find out that you shrunk & your not at home anymore but it looked familiar to you.Suddenly you hear a voice:"What's this?" you looked up & saw ________ looking down at you.
1.title: One strange night.

choices: She manages to get there without anyone noticing
Yumi walks up behind her and asks what she's doing
11.content: You were shocked as you saw Ami from the show looking down at you. She picks you up gently & looks at you with worrying eyes. "Are you okay little guy?" She asked. You were extremely nervous being this close to her so all you could do was nod. She then puts her finger on your back and pets you gently. "It's okay little guy!" she exclaimed. "I promise I'll keep you safe!" She then brings you to her lips and give you a gentle kiss and it causes you to blush. Ami begins to return to her room.
11.title: Ami (The Princess of Pop.)

choices: She actually believes you and tries to help you
She doesn't believe a word you said and gets furious
Ami walks in and asks Yumi what she's doing
12.content: Yumi grabs you and lifts you up to her face. She examines you for a bit and asks "How did get in here and get this small?" You were incredibly nervous and couldn't answer either of those questions. "How do I know you aren't some little pervert who shrunk himself just get a peek of me or Ami in the shower or while we're changing?" Yumi asks getting even angrier. You had to say something or else who knows what she'll do to you! "Please you have to believe me! I don't know how I got here or why I'm this small, I just want to turn back to normal and go home!" You exclaimed hoping she would believe you. Does it work?
12.title: Yumi (The Goddess of Rock)

choices: Ami wants to help you get back to normal.
Yumi gets a rather sexy idea
13.content: Yumi grabs you and brings you to her face. Both her and Ami stare at you for a bit. "Omg He's so tiny!" exclaimed Yumi. "How do you think he get so small?" asked Ami. You couldn't believe what was happening right now, You are now shrunken in a cartoon with both of the main characters looking right at you while you're in the palm of their hands. After awhile Yumi turns to Ami and says "Well he's pretty much ours now, so we can do whatever we want with him." After hearing that you were even more terrified than you were before. *What are they going to do to me?!?* You thought to yourself.
13.title: Ami and Yumi

info.brief_description: You shrink in the unappreciated show Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi.
info.pretty_title: Shrunk in Hi Hi Puffy AmiYumi
